citations.narrative:
A facility representative said that all dogs are being vaccinated and dewormed, however records for vaccinations and
dewormers given isn't kept for each dog for neopar and neovac (rabies vaccinations records were available). Medical
records that have the names of all vaccines and treatments given to dogs have to be maintained to ensure each dog is
being kept up to date on their care. Ensure to maintain medical records for adult dogs as required.
***To correct from August 7, 2025 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.13(b)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
A facility representative said that all dogs are being vaccinated and dewormed, however records for vaccinations and 
dewormers given isn't kept for each dog for neopar and neovac (rabies vaccinations records were available). Medical 
records that have the names of all vaccines and treatments given to dogs have to be maintained to ensure each dog is 
being kept up to date on their care. Ensure to maintain medical records for adult dogs as required.  
***To correct from August 7, 2025 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
